Package net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network.simpleimpl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMessage
    Implement this interface for each message you wish to define.
    IMessageHandler<REQ extends IMessage,REPLY extends IMessage>
    A message handler based on IMessage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessageContext
    Context for the IMessageHandler
    SimpleChannelHandlerWrapper<REQ extends IMessage,REPLY extends IMessage>  
    SimpleIndexedCodec  
    SimpleNetworkWrapper
    This class is a simplified netty wrapper for those not wishing to deal with the full power of netty.
